roleset.name: sensorilly pleasing
roleset.note: LOVELY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from lovely.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is lovely (may require concatenation)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Pale freckly skin is lovely , and sunbeds are really dangerous and just not good for you .

example.name: concatenation
example.text: the tree of knowledge is ?lovely to look at

example.name: both args
example.text: What-1 *PRO*-1 is lovely to me is ugly to you.
